ValidationRule.description: Effective date for Permit applicant can not be in past current date(system date)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator LTD', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Entertainment_Work',Effective_Date__c < TODAY(), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending Payment'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Expired'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Ready_to_Submit__c, 'Yes'), ISPICKVAL( Ready_to_Resubmit__c , 'Yes') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Effective Date can not be less than current date. Change your answer to None and return to the Registration Duration section to correct the Effective Date.
